00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_GENERATOR_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_GENERATOR_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoiseMath.h"
00030 #include "NoiseVectorTable.h"
00031 #include "NoisePlatform.h"
00032 
00033 namespace noisepp
00034 {
00035         #define NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_X \
00036                 const int x0 = (x > Real(0.0) ? (int)x : (int)x - 1); \
00037                 const int x1 = x0 + 1;
00038         #define NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_Y \
00039                 const int y0 = (y > Real(0.0) ? (int)y : (int)y - 1); \
00040                 const int y1 = y0 + 1;
00041         #define NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_Z \
00042                 const int z0 = (z > Real(0.0) ? (int)z : (int)z - 1); \
00043                 const int z1 = z0 + 1;
00044 
00045         #define NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_1D \
00046                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_X
00047 
00048         #define NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_2D \
00049                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_X \
00050                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_Y
00051 
00052         #define NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_3D \
00053                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_X \
00054                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_Y \
00055                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_Z
00056 
00057         enum { NOISE_QUALITY_LOW=0, NOISE_QUALITY_STD=1, NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH=2, NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_LOW=3, NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_STD=4, NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_HIGH=5 };
00058 
00059         const int NOISE_X_FACTOR = 1619;
00060         const int NOISE_Y_FACTOR = 31337;
00061         const int NOISE_Z_FACTOR = 6971;
00062         const int NOISE_SEED_FACTOR = 1013;
00063         const int NOISE_SHIFT = 8;
00064 
00065         const Real FAST_NOISE_SCALE_FACTOR = 0.5;
00066 
00067         class Generator1D
00068         {
00069                 private:
00070                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientNoise (Real fx, int ix, int seed)
00071                         {
00072                                 int vIndex = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * ix + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0xffffffff;
00073                                 vIndex ^= (vIndex >> NOISE_SHIFT);
00074                                 vIndex &= 0xff;
00075 
00076                                 const Real xGradient = randomVectors3D[(vIndex<<2)];
00077 
00078                                 const Real xDelta = fx - Real(ix);
00079                                 return xDelta * xGradient;
00080                         }
00081 
00082                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real interpGradientCoherentNoise (Real x, int x0, int x1, Real xs, int seed, Real scale)
00083                         {
00084                                 Real n0, n1;
00085                                 n0 = calcGradientNoise(x, x0, seed);
00086                                 n1 = calcGradientNoise(x, x1, seed);
00087                                 return Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs) * scale;
00088                         }
00089 
00090                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientFastNoise (Real fx, int ix, int seed)
00091                         {
00092                                 int vIndex = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * ix + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0xffffffff;
00093                                 vIndex ^= (vIndex >> NOISE_SHIFT);
00094                                 vIndex &= 0xff;
00095                                 return gradientVector[vIndex];
00096                         }
00097 
00098                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (Real x, int x0, int x1, Real xs, int seed, Real scale)
00099                         {
00100                                 Real n0, n1;
00101                                 n0 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, x0, seed);
00102                                 n1 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, x1, seed);
00103                                 return Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs) * scale;
00104                         }
00105 
00106                         static NOISEPP_INLINE int intNoise (int x, int seed)
00107                         {
00108                                 int n = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * x + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0x7fffffff;
00109                                 n = (n >> 13) ^ n;
00110                                 return (n * (n * n * 60493 + 19990303) + 1376312589) & 0x7fffffff;
00111                         }
00112                 public:
00113                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (Real x, int seed, Real scale)
00114                         {
00115                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_1D;
00116 
00117                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve5 (x - Real(x0));
00118 
00119                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise (x, x0, x1, xs, seed, scale);
00120                         }
00121 
00122                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (Real x, int seed, Real scale)
00123                         {
00124                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_1D;
00125 
00126                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve3 (x - Real(x0));
00127 
00128                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise (x, x0, x1, xs, seed, scale);
00129                         }
00130 
00131                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (Real x, int seed, Real scale)
00132                         {
00133                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_1D;
00134 
00135                                 const Real xs = x - Real(x0);
00136 
00137                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise (x, x0, x1, xs, seed, scale);
00138                         }
00139 
00140                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (Real x, int seed, Real scale)
00141                         {
00142                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_1D;
00143 
00144                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve5 (x - Real(x0));
00145 
00146                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (x, x0, x1, xs, seed, scale);
00147                         }
00148 
00149                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (Real x, int seed, Real scale)
00150                         {
00151                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_1D;
00152 
00153                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve3 (x - Real(x0));
00154 
00155                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (x, x0, x1, xs, seed, scale);
00156                         }
00157 
00158                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (Real x, int seed, Real scale)
00159                         {
00160                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_1D;
00161 
00162                                 const Real xs = x - Real(x0);
00163 
00164                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (x, x0, x1, xs, seed, scale);
00165                         }
00166 
00167                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcNoise (int x, int seed)
00168                         {
00169                                 return Real(1.0) - ((Real)intNoise(x, seed) / Real(1073741824.0));
00170                         }
00171         };
00172         class Generator2D
00173         {
00174                 private:
00175                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientNoise (Real fx, Real fy, int ix, int iy, int seed)
00176                         {
00177                                 int vIndex = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * ix + NOISE_Y_FACTOR * iy + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0xffffffff;
00178                                 vIndex ^= (vIndex >> NOISE_SHIFT);
00179                                 vIndex &= 0xff;
00180 
00181                                 const Real xGradient = randomVectors3D[(vIndex<<2)];
00182                                 const Real yGradient = randomVectors3D[(vIndex<<2)+1];
00183 
00184                                 const Real xDelta = fx - Real(ix);
00185                                 const Real yDelta = fy - Real(iy);
00186                                 return (xGradient * xDelta + yGradient * yDelta);
00187                         }
00188 
00189                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real interpGradientCoherentNoise (Real x, Real y, int x0, int x1, int y0, int y1, Real xs, Real ys, int seed, Real scale)
00190                         {
00191                                 Real n0, n1, ix0, ix1;
00192                                 n0 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, x0, y0, seed);
00193                                 n1 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, x1, y0, seed);
00194                                 ix0 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00195                                 n0 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, x0, y1, seed);
00196                                 n1 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, x1, y1, seed);
00197                                 ix1 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00198                                 return Math::InterpLinear (ix0, ix1, ys) * scale;
00199                         }
00200 
00201                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientFastNoise (Real fx, Real fy, int ix, int iy, int seed)
00202                         {
00203                                 int vIndex = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * ix + NOISE_Y_FACTOR * iy + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0xffffffff;
00204                                 vIndex ^= (vIndex >> NOISE_SHIFT);
00205                                 vIndex &= 0xff;
00206                                 return gradientVector[vIndex];
00207                         }
00208 
00209                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (Real x, Real y, int x0, int x1, int y0, int y1, Real xs, Real ys, int seed, Real scale)
00210                         {
00211                                 Real n0, n1, ix0, ix1;
00212                                 n0 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, x0, y0, seed);
00213                                 n1 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, x1, y0, seed);
00214                                 ix0 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00215                                 n0 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, x0, y1, seed);
00216                                 n1 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, x1, y1, seed);
00217                                 ix1 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00218                                 return Math::InterpLinear (ix0, ix1, ys) * scale;
00219                         }
00220 
00221                         static NOISEPP_INLINE int intNoise (int x, int y, int seed)
00222                         {
00223                                 int n = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * x + NOISE_Y_FACTOR * y + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0x7fffffff;
00224                                 n = (n >> 13) ^ n;
00225                                 return (n * (n * n * 60493 + 19990303) + 1376312589) & 0x7fffffff;
00226                         }
00227                 public:
00228                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (Real x, Real y, int seed, Real scale)
00229                         {
00230                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_2D;
00231 
00232                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve5 (x - Real(x0));
00233                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve5 (y - Real(y0));
00234 
00235                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise (x, y, x0, x1, y0, y1, xs, ys, seed, scale);
00236                         }
00237 
00238                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (Real x, Real y, int seed, Real scale)
00239                         {
00240                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_2D;
00241 
00242                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve3 (x - Real(x0));
00243                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve3 (y - Real(y0));
00244 
00245                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise (x, y, x0, x1, y0, y1, xs, ys, seed, scale);
00246                         }
00247 
00248                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (Real x, Real y, int seed, Real scale)
00249                         {
00250                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_2D;
00251 
00252                                 const Real xs = x - Real(x0);
00253                                 const Real ys = y - Real(y0);
00254 
00255                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise (x, y, x0, x1, y0, y1, xs, ys, seed, scale);
00256                         }
00257 
00258                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (Real x, Real y, int seed, Real scale)
00259                         {
00260                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_2D;
00261 
00262                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve5 (x - Real(x0));
00263                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve5 (y - Real(y0));
00264 
00265                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (x, y, x0, x1, y0, y1, xs, ys, seed, scale);
00266                         }
00267 
00268                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (Real x, Real y, int seed, Real scale)
00269                         {
00270                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_2D;
00271 
00272                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve3 (x - Real(x0));
00273                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve3 (y - Real(y0));
00274 
00275                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (x, y, x0, x1, y0, y1, xs, ys, seed, scale);
00276                         }
00277 
00278                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (Real x, Real y, int seed, Real scale)
00279                         {
00280                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_2D;
00281 
00282                                 const Real xs = x - Real(x0);
00283                                 const Real ys = y - Real(y0);
00284 
00285                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (x, y, x0, x1, y0, y1, xs, ys, seed, scale);
00286                         }
00287 
00288                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcNoise (int x, int y, int seed=0)
00289                         {
00290                                 return Real(1.0) - ((Real)intNoise(x, y, seed) / Real(1073741824.0));
00291                         }
00292         };
00293         class Generator3D
00294         {
00295                 private:
00296                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientNoise (Real fx, Real fy, Real fz, int ix, int iy, int iz, int seed)
00297                         {
00298                                 int vIndex = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * ix + NOISE_Y_FACTOR * iy + NOISE_Z_FACTOR * iz + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0xffffffff;
00299                                 vIndex ^= (vIndex >> NOISE_SHIFT);
00300                                 vIndex &= 0xff;
00301 
00302                                 const Real xGradient = randomVectors3D[(vIndex<<2)];
00303                                 const Real yGradient = randomVectors3D[(vIndex<<2)+1];
00304                                 const Real zGradient = randomVectors3D[(vIndex<<2)+2];
00305 
00306                                 const Real xDelta = fx - Real(ix);
00307                                 const Real yDelta = fy - Real(iy);
00308                                 const Real zDelta = fz - Real(iz);
00309                                 return (xGradient * xDelta + yGradient * yDelta + zGradient * zDelta);
00310                         }
00311 
00312                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real interpGradientCoherentNoise (Real x, Real y, Real z, int x0, int x1, int y0, int y1, int z0, int z1, Real xs, Real ys, Real zs, int seed, Real scale)
00313                         {
00314                                 Real n0, n1, ix0, ix1, iy0, iy1;
00315                                 n0 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x0, y0, z0, seed);
00316                                 n1 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x1, y0, z0, seed);
00317                                 ix0 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00318                                 n0 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x0, y1, z0, seed);
00319                                 n1 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x1, y1, z0, seed);
00320                                 ix1 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00321                                 iy0 = Math::InterpLinear (ix0, ix1, ys);
00322                                 n0 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x0, y0, z1, seed);
00323                                 n1 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x1, y0, z1, seed);
00324                                 ix0 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00325                                 n0 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x0, y1, z1, seed);
00326                                 n1 = calcGradientNoise(x, y, z, x1, y1, z1, seed);
00327                                 ix1 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00328                                 iy1 = Math::InterpLinear (ix0, ix1, ys);
00329 
00330                                 return Math::InterpLinear (iy0, iy1, zs) * scale;
00331                         }
00332 
00333                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real interpGradientCoherentFastNoise (Real x, Real y, Real z, int x0, int x1, int y0, int y1, int z0, int z1, Real xs, Real ys, Real zs, int seed, Real scale)
00334                         {
00335                                 Real n0, n1, ix0, ix1, iy0, iy1;
00336                                 n0 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x0, y0, z0, seed);
00337                                 n1 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x1, y0, z0, seed);
00338                                 ix0 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00339                                 n0 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x0, y1, z0, seed);
00340                                 n1 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x1, y1, z0, seed);
00341                                 ix1 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00342                                 iy0 = Math::InterpLinear (ix0, ix1, ys);
00343                                 n0 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x0, y0, z1, seed);
00344                                 n1 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x1, y0, z1, seed);
00345                                 ix0 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00346                                 n0 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x0, y1, z1, seed);
00347                                 n1 = calcGradientFastNoise(x, y, z, x1, y1, z1, seed);
00348                                 ix1 = Math::InterpLinear (n0, n1, xs);
00349                                 iy1 = Math::InterpLinear (ix0, ix1, ys);
00350 
00351                                 return Math::InterpLinear (iy0, iy1, zs) * scale;
00352                         }
00353 
00354                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientFastNoise (Real fx, Real fy, Real fz, int ix, int iy, int iz, int seed)
00355                         {
00356                                 int vIndex = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * ix + NOISE_Y_FACTOR * iy + NOISE_Z_FACTOR * iz + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0xffffffff;
00357                                 vIndex ^= (vIndex >> NOISE_SHIFT);
00358                                 vIndex &= 0xff;
00359                                 return gradientVector[vIndex];
00360                         }
00361 
00362                         static NOISEPP_INLINE int intNoise (int x, int y, int z, int seed)
00363                         {
00364                                 int n = (NOISE_X_FACTOR * x + NOISE_Y_FACTOR * y + NOISE_Z_FACTOR * z + NOISE_SEED_FACTOR * seed) & 0x7fffffff;
00365                                 n = (n >> 13) ^ n;
00366                                 return (n * (n * n * 60493 + 19990303) + 1376312589) & 0x7fffffff;
00367                         }
00368                 public:
00369                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed, Real scale)
00370                         {
00371                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_3D;
00372 
00373                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve5 (x - Real(x0));
00374                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve5 (y - Real(y0));
00375                                 const Real zs = Math::CubicCurve5 (z - Real(z0));
00376 
00377                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise(x, y, z, x0, x1, y0, y1, z0, z1, xs, ys, zs, seed, scale);
00378                         }
00379 
00380                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed, Real scale)
00381                         {
00382                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_3D;
00383 
00384                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve3 (x - Real(x0));
00385                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve3 (y - Real(y0));
00386                                 const Real zs = Math::CubicCurve3 (z - Real(z0));
00387 
00388                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise(x, y, z, x0, x1, y0, y1, z0, z1, xs, ys, zs, seed, scale);
00389                         }
00390 
00391                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed, Real scale)
00392                         {
00393                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_3D;
00394 
00395                                 const Real xs = x - Real(x0);
00396                                 const Real ys = y - Real(y0);
00397                                 const Real zs = z - Real(z0);
00398 
00399                                 return interpGradientCoherentNoise(x, y, z, x0, x1, y0, y1, z0, z1, xs, ys, zs, seed, scale);
00400                         }
00401 
00402                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed, Real scale)
00403                         {
00404                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_3D;
00405 
00406                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve5 (x - Real(x0));
00407                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve5 (y - Real(y0));
00408                                 const Real zs = Math::CubicCurve5 (z - Real(z0));
00409 
00410                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise(x, y, z, x0, x1, y0, y1, z0, z1, xs, ys, zs, seed, scale);
00411                         }
00412 
00413                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed, Real scale)
00414                         {
00415                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_3D;
00416 
00417                                 const Real xs = Math::CubicCurve3 (x - Real(x0));
00418                                 const Real ys = Math::CubicCurve3 (y - Real(y0));
00419                                 const Real zs = Math::CubicCurve3 (z - Real(z0));
00420 
00421                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise(x, y, z, x0, x1, y0, y1, z0, z1, xs, ys, zs, seed, scale);
00422                         }
00423 
00424                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed, Real scale)
00425                         {
00426                                 NOISE_GENERATOR_INTEGER_CLAMP_3D;
00427 
00428                                 const Real xs = x - Real(x0);
00429                                 const Real ys = y - Real(y0);
00430                                 const Real zs = z - Real(z0);
00431 
00432                                 return interpGradientCoherentFastNoise(x, y, z, x0, x1, y0, y1, z0, z1, xs, ys, zs, seed, scale);
00433                         }
00434 
00435                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real calcNoise (int x, int y, int z, int seed=0)
00436                         {
00437                                 return Real(1.0) - ((Real)intNoise(x, y, z, seed) / Real(1073741824.0));
00438                         }
00439         };
